image.label: Picture
image.help: Adverts may be GIF images if you want something animated

max_impressions.label: Maximum views
max_impressions.help: Adverts will stop being served when this number is reached, or when the end date passes

clicks.label: Clicks
clicks.help: Conversion rate is given by (clicks / views) * 100

frontpage.label: Show on front page
frontpage.help: Will also show on search pages, user pages, and the issue archive

cat_selection.label: Which categories
cat_selection.help: If some categories are selected here, the advert will only show, when on a category or article page, on categories or articles which are in one of the categories you set here. If you leave this blank, it will be shown in all cases

sidebar.label: This is a sidebar advert
sidebar.help: Sidebar adverts are square. If not checked, this will be a header advert and will be a landscape rectangle
